column5: I would love to have a support partner. I have no one to share this heartbreaking secret with and I feel I have no way out. Would love to even just commiserate and listen to one another.
I knew about ED but had no idea death grip syndrome was a thing! Thank you for explaining:)
Thank you. This really helps my perspective.

I don‚Äôt cook or clean at all, haha. Shameful yes, but my job is stressful and I don‚Äôt have the energy. He will do anything to help me, except ceasing the sneakiness and lying that comes with being a PA. He doesn‚Äôt feel work is beneath him, he just doesn‚Äôt have the same level of ambition that I do. He‚Äôs the sort of person who is content enough to make ends meet, whereas I need to grow and grow and grow and excel. 
My income has nothing to do with his, that‚Äôs a non issue. We are self sufficient.
You are so right: I wish I could internalize it. Thank you, you‚Äôre so sweet.
That would be wonderful. I just don‚Äôt know how to stand up and just do it!!! How do you just do it? I‚Äôm so ashamed I don‚Äôt want to be seen working out, that includes me seeing myself.

That‚Äôs what‚Äôs weird. He truly is none of those things besides unsuccessful. But it‚Äôs his choice. He‚Äôs incredibly intelligent but feels like work is sub par. He‚Äôd rather make art all day. So he feels he has a sense of freedom by having a low maintenance job, whereas I am tethered to my career. I don‚Äôt have a job, I have a career marriage that I excel at and am vigilantly passionate about. He has no other addictions, he ha plenty of friends and all of them are standup people, who have integrity and are well-rounded and would be horrified if they knew that he is a PA. Absolutely horrified and they would never see it coming.  His health is fine, he‚Äôs close to his family. It‚Äôs the weirdest thing. No childhood trauma that he is aware of has initiated this. 

That‚Äôs where I struggle - the person he is without this disease is amazing. He‚Äôs wonderful on every level. Caring, genuine to his friends (just not me, as he‚Äôs wanking it to other girls), generous and giving, insightful and so ridiculously smart. So it‚Äôs very hard to give up all of the things he is without this. 
I know for the greater good what the answer is, but I‚Äôm not quite ready. 

What‚Äôs the title?

Thanks. He works in a retail store. He does not make any money. 
He also has zero access to mine. 
I am not dependent on anyone for that stuff. 

Would love to hear your insight.
Hi, just curious: what is pied and dgs?

44, would love to talk to ANYONE!!! Even recovered PA‚Äôs, to help me understand some things, but mostly, to feel a sense of not being so alone.

Someone please talk to me!:)

Tumblr.
Had no idea young girls posted provocative photos with hashtags like #venmo and PayPal to send custom nudes and videos for money. Usually $25/every five pics, $40 for video. It‚Äôs totally curated pornography, where these girls will do anything to get paid. 

And I mean anything. 
Horrific.
I am still having heart palpitations!

CC And cash and GET THERE EARLY 
All reasonable size shirts sold out within moments. I was there 15 min after door in line for merch and got to table around 7:25 to find only S and M in everything.
Venue posted an update on Facebook - doors at 6, show at 8
Hey any updates?üôèüèª

But people actually mastuebare to pastel colored horses in cartoons??? 

Part of me wants to laugh because this is crazy.

You make some really good points, but I have a hard time dismissing someone as a pedophiliac just because the porn they have been documented to have viewed via their history etc. is of 18-20 year olds posed to look young. Perhaps he‚Äôs smart so he knows what key words to avoid and what key words to use in his searches. It doesn‚Äôt change the fact that he‚Äôs into young girls. 

This whole situation is so unsettling - OP I am so sorry this is happening, I cannot begin to imagine how you‚Äôre processing the many layers of this. Hugs to you, stay strong and stand your ground.
Do you know if the venue parking is difficult at all by chance? I‚Äôm guessing I‚Äôd be safe to get there at 4? lol this wasn‚Äôt complicated when I was a kid.
Concur. No opener for any shows (confirmed) and every show seems to start promptly one hour after doors.

THANK YOU THIS IS SO WONDERFUL 
‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüòÇ

Following for the same reason. A 7pm start time is absolutely ridiculous. 
It makes zero sense. 

Also, can‚Äôt find if there‚Äôs an opener. I‚Äôm driving 2.5 hours for this, so if they‚Äôre starting at 7 I am going to have to get some speeding tickets. 

Do you know if there‚Äôs an opener?

Good god I‚Äôm so sorry this happened to you. 

I can feel you on the masturbatjng to the same stuff ordeal. I‚Äôm 43, still doing it. I don‚Äôt know wtf is happening. Therapist is so damn confused. So am I. Sickening.

I agree regarding the title, I didn‚Äôt realize it did that, I thought it was in the body of the message. It won‚Äôt let me edit it, unfortunately.

Thank you for your insight!!!
Why don‚Äôt YOU leave?

Rape?
Run.

You know what - AMEN. 
Thank you for saying what a lot of people want to say but can‚Äôt. 
You are so right. So damn right.

Thanks for having the courage to speak so candidly about your situation.
I understand the situation regarding you not being attracted to your wife (I don‚Äôt like it, I wish it were different for her, and you, but I understand your explanation.), but I‚Äôm curious how you love her, as a whole. Or don‚Äôt you?

Thanks for this.

He knows he has a problem. He‚Äôs admitted to it. It‚Äôs been almost lifelong. He wanted to get help. Says he can handle on his own. Said he hasn‚Äôt done it at all lately. 
How is that even possible. It‚Äôs an addiction. Addictions require external help for recovery. This isn‚Äôt something you can just physically detox off of.

He is ashamed. So he shuts down or stonewalls me. 
He KNOWS it hurts me. He even verbally acknowledges this and he even stated that EVERYTHING wrong with our relationship is a result of this. 

So I‚Äôm so confused.
Hi. Same. Just a different amusement park for me.

I‚Äôm the same situation. Thinks he can pacify me with ‚ÄúI‚Äôm getting better‚Äù, by doing it on his own. 
Can‚Äôt prove he‚Äôs doing anything other than telling me that he watched movies as opposed to masturbating on the Internet. 

The bottom line is that we don‚Äôt deserve this any we would likely tell anyone else to leave their PA partner, but yet here we are not taking that advice. 
It‚Äôs hard. It feels like there‚Äôs no way out. 
Not to mention that this is such an epidemic, it‚Äôs going to be hard for me not to assume that any future partner isn‚Äôt hiding stuff just the same. 
He was really good at it. I can‚Äôt explain the lengths I went to to validate my suspicion, but he is really good at it.

I just posted about this but didn‚Äôt know this term. This is EXACTLY what I‚Äôm going through. Thanks for this, it‚Äôll help me explain better to my therapist.

I hope you feel better. And I understand. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôve learned in my depression:
People are afraid of people who struggle - it is usually not a conscious reaction. As a result, they unknowingly pull back. 

I have learned that my depression has prevented me from socially engaging others who I used to want to interact with. Many factors invoked: inability to fake it, inability to find the energy to keep up with conversation, lack of interest in event or conversation, self esteem issues preventing me from even wanting to be seen, and overall jealousy of those who have the ability to take care of themselves without effort and appear to be able to enjoy and engage life seamlessly. 
As a result of the above, I have isolated myself.
People gave up on asking me out, inviting me to things, and even checking in on me. 
I take some of the blame. Do wish people would be more vigilant in their efforts of friendship, and suddenly have a magic wand to see through my disinterest as an insult to them, but an injury to myself? Yes, but I can‚Äôt control others. 

So maybe if you put things into a different perspective and try to look from the outside looking in. It might help.
It doesn‚Äôt make it better, but it might help.

There is nothing wrong with this! If it feels good then by all means! 
After time, you may want to even introduce it into the bedroom with your wife. It‚Äôll be quite adventurous for her and trust me, a lot of women like it.

Women worry about this stuff, so telling her will not only make her feel good about being with you, and knowing how much you love it, but she will feel so much more confident and likely to ‚Äúlet go‚Äù which will make it wonderful for you both!
30 days? I can‚Äôt even imagine. How did you overcome this without resigning to hunger pain? Were you weak at all?
This is so sweet I can‚Äôt take it
This made me laugh out loud because that is my entire childhood AND marriage in a nut shell üòÇüòÇüòÇ

Yeah, I‚Äôm sure not all do. But I‚Äôm willing to bet that PA‚Äôs who say that they don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs cheating or betrayal would feel differently if it happened to them. However, we all know it won‚Äôt change them - it will not rehab them. It will just make everyone involved feel worse.
Trannies... üòÇüòÇüòÇ yes. Perfect.

Indeed.
It‚Äôs blindness. And selfish. 
Yes, they have an addiction, but that doesn‚Äôt mean they don‚Äôt have common sense and courtesy.
Hahaha!!! I‚Äôm laughing so hard!
I think I might just make a fake trail. My rage is so intense that I‚Äôm feeling vindictive. I know it‚Äôs wrong. But so are a lot of things.
This.

The addiction, over time, becomes mental, not physical. My PA has gotten to the point where his compulsive porn viewing and virtual adventure seeking no longer has an ejaculation requirement. It becomes so much more than that, often times.

I found several photos of girls that I know were borderline 18. What‚Äôs disturbing is that they were NOT naked and they were not in ‚Äúsexy‚Äù poses. 
I could not tell if it was coincidence as if maybe they were photos of a family member (they were candid shots or group friend photos). I just didn‚Äôt think that it made sense to be compiled in the same storage place as the porn. So, imagine. It‚Äôs concerning. And scary, but how do I ever know. 
Maybe I‚Äôm overthinking.
He left in shame. Know that. It is not your fault - he was in denial.

Do a search on .exe files on your computer to look for a new browser executable install file. 
You can install it, use it, and uninstall it, all the while hiding the .exe in a place you‚Äôd never look. 
They‚Äôre clever. There are literally places on the Internet for them to talk about how to effectively hide their porn. It‚Äôs sick.
Threatens it one way or another on every D-DAY (been at least four now) or confrontation or when I am feeling my worst and break down and I start blaming him to his face.
This guy rocks.

Ugh. Sort of same here. When I bring it up he shuts down or will say ‚Äúthat‚Äôs not what‚Äôs happening‚Äù... well then what is? 

The accusing of cheating - yep. I can‚Äôt say anything right because it‚Äôs assumed I‚Äôm coming from that place.
Frustrating, and understandable. Hugs to you.

Since my multiple (evolving each time) D-DAYS, sex was iffy, but when I laid the law on recovery, sex has been more frequent and passionate. This has messed with my mind so much that I can‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs authentic; I instead think its to offset the need to watch other women. So disheartening.

Why can‚Äôt you talk about it?
Good lord. That is so scary. Did you leave him at that point or did he recover?

‚ÄúAppraised the value of his actions‚Äù 
There it is. Holy shit.
If we all did that...
You are freaking amazing and I wish I had your strength!!!!!üëäüèºüëäüèºüëäüèºüëäüèº

New user. 
Perhaps someone knows someone who uses this as a safe place and is betraying them on yet another level.

You came here to share your story. Much appreciated. Your hatred and resentment towards those who are affected by your addiction is unwarranted. This is the price an addict pays, just like the price that someone who has been hurt by a PA has paid. 
Do the work, keep doing the work. Your anger is demonstrating that you‚Äôre still recovering, and if you‚Äôre active, then much respect to you, but it‚Äôs obvious you still have a long way to come. 
You have anger issues and other obvious behavioral disorders that are exacerbated by your PA. What a mess that must feel like! I‚Äôm sorry you suffer. But we do too, and this is our space, so let us be. We have the right, and you‚Äôre terrorizing us with this post. 

Best to you.

Please call a resource line in your area. 
One national resource [SAMHSA](https://www.samhsa.gov/find-help/national-helpline) that will be able to guide you.

It is important that you open up to someone that cares about you, for support, and for safety.

This person is not stable, by any means. He is not well. I hope you keep your distance from him.
It sounds like you have a lot of healing to do, from events and occurrences that are far beyond the scope of PA, exponentially. 

Remember that you are still here, that you‚Äôve already made it past the worst day of your life, and you have no choice but to go upward. 
Hugs.
Thanks for this! It‚Äôs interesting to hear directly from a recovering PA. It makes hope feel closer.

Platforms 
Methods
Meaning magazines to escorts
I guess I‚Äôm referring to mediums, not acts.

Several layers of PA. Watching videos, escalate to live cams, escalate to cam2cam where you masturbate together, escalate to custom pint paying girls to their Venmo acciujbtd, to more personal cam2cam, to browsing Fuckbpk etc, some escalating to Tindrr sexting girls in the area, escalate to escorts, hookers, affairs.
It‚Äôs your RSD manifesting through oversharing.
You‚Äôre right. This is so fucking hard.

It‚Äôs different in that it‚Äôs not something that detoxes out of your system physically. It is not a physical addiction. 
Substance abusers can get clean and rehab to sobriety. PA‚Äôs have a different battle in consideration of no detox, and how accessible things are.

I don‚Äôt know what to say other than what everyone says - leave. I won‚Äôt say it, you know your truth. 
But please spend time on yourself as a priority - live your life as you anticipate you would live  it without ANYONE as a partner. Make yourself your partner.
Thank you everyone! I can‚Äôt believe it was that simple lol

PA is not just watching videos of recorded porn or looking at photographs. It has evolved into cam girls, and customizable porn. That‚Äôs what those girls are - all customizable porn. It‚Äôs not emotional, it‚Äôs a business on their end and a thrill on the PA‚Äôs end. It‚Äôs extremely common.
Most of the girls use hashtags such as #venmo which is their code to say what they do. 

So, it‚Äôs all the same to me. He is sick. I love him. 
Yes, I know this isn‚Äôt healthy for me, not at all. But I believe in him. 

At least today I do. 


Can I ask why you think it‚Äôs cheating? Are you considering it in the same context of having sex with an escort?

Get an old flip phone or one that can‚Äôt handle social media apps.
They still make them. Walmart.

Also, sexting is still porn.
Saying it isn‚Äôt is no different than someone saying marijuana is not a drug but cocaine is. 
Both are.

Do you think this is emotionally safe enough to watch with a PA?
I understand there are no visual triggers but wondering if it‚Äôs something you might think could result in resentment or a fight after watching.

Get out now. It‚Äôs going to suck, but he is not safe for you. 
He is disturbed and sick and will not learn how important treatment is until he hits the bottom and right now he‚Äôs floating by with your permission.

Don‚Äôt be like me, and those of us, who still don‚Äôt have the strength over too much time to leave. 
This is your chance before you get sucked into the guilt and manipulation and gaslighting that comes along with loving a PA.

If you are overweight, it‚Äôs best to lose some by taking care of YOURself. And you know this. Of course it‚Äôs hard to get past the gloom that comes with being unhappy with yourself. But your boyfriend making it very clear to you that he isn‚Äôt attracted to you is crap. A man who truly loves you would accept you at any size.
Is it ok for someone‚Äôs attraction to you to decrease due to a change in your body? Of course it is. But it doesn‚Äôt have to be hurtful and it doesn‚Äôt have to be avoided.

If he was a good person, he would be able to honestly say that he recognizes how this affects you, that your self loathing does have an impact on the overall health of your relationship, and he could stand by you and HELP you get a good start on improving your self care.
For him to avoid talking about it by changing the subject is reflective of his character.

Girl, move on. 
He‚Äôs a dick.
Wonderful!

I‚Äôve found that addicts typically do not recover into sobriety until they have lost everything.

While you are working on improving your life, things may change for him in time and maybe down the road you will find each other again.

Do you mean the something similar to when we as women‚Äùthrob‚Äù internally when horny?

I don‚Äôt have a PA but my libido is super high (it‚Äôs because of a medication I take) and it happens to me a lot. I AM acutely aware and for me it either goes away from distraction or I end up masturbating (I don‚Äôt need porn for that, haha). 

I can see how it‚Äôs relative to PA - almost like a withdrawal symptom?

I look at myself as a normal sexual being but I recognize how this happening with a PA is startling. 
Is he erect when doing this?

This is the right thing to do. 
However, I understand the worry behind cancelling the wedding.
What if, in order to have time to get your life in order to move on safely, you told family/friends that you‚Äôre going to re-schedule? It‚Äôs a white lie but will get them off your back. 

When you tell him, I‚Äôm sure he will be devastated. He has a disease and therefore his mind is fogged by it. Remember that. It‚Äôs not him, it‚Äôs the disease, and he needs help. Every moment he isn‚Äôt getting help is a tortured moment for you.


The advice I‚Äôm giving you is what I wish I could give and take myself. 

Be strong, exercise your courage. You can do this, and we are here for you.

Thank you for your insight. I‚Äôm working on finding strength. 

I‚Äôm sorry you were hurt too. Hugs.

I am heartbroken for you, and I understand, and it‚Äôs so unfortunately familiar. 
I wish we could all hug you.
Find light in yourself - you have done NOTHING wrong. NOTHING. 
All you did was try. 

I‚Äôm not going to tell you how to move on, or to even do so - I‚Äôd be a hypocrite. 
But I do hope that you find some solace somehow and that time will heal your heart. 

Fuck this guy.

:)

I hope this will help. So, it‚Äôs a positive step.

THIS. 


I feel this. I hate my body now, my face, my age. 
I was fine before this. Sure, I had self esteem issues and was sometimes insecure but for the most part, when we met, I was a confident woman. 
Now, not at all. 
Now I can‚Äôt leave the house with fearing being judged. I can‚Äôt fuck him without thinking he‚Äôs closing his eyes and pretending it‚Äôs one of the tumblr Venmo girls or camgirls or Snapchat skanks he sends money to jerk off to.

You too eh? 
Should we start an online therapy group? Or maybe this is it!

I‚Äôm seeing that it‚Äôs more and more common and I‚Äôm afraid it will evolve in society as something acceptable that us women are supposed to put up with. 
It‚Äôs taking us back 100 years in womanhood.

I hate this for you. This is EXACTLY what I‚Äôm dealing with. 
Following for advice.
If you need a friend, message me. Maybe we can vent together and find inspiration if one our situations should change for the better.

Can‚Äôt fucking stand this shit anymore. It‚Äôs ruined me.

This is wonderful!
How do you move across the mindset though of wondering if he may be, just like before D Day with the former?
I worry I won‚Äôt trust anyone ever again and will always worry that they‚Äôre doing it quietly like my boyfriend now had been for two years. Says he isn‚Äôt going it but I know he hasn‚Äôt gotten help, so he‚Äôs obviously just gotten smarter about it. 
Do you end up snooping to validate your fears? That‚Äôs my feAr.

Start by lightly hovering until you feel the warmth of his tongue. It‚Äôll spark you up and then bring you to the point of wanting more. Once you get there you won‚Äôt care what your body is doing.
If he is uncomfortable he will move. 
Don‚Äôt even worry about it!

Fucking brilliant. 
And terrible.

Awesome! What does IF stand for?

This. This is the most realistic and ultimate goal.
You go girl! I‚Äôm too ashamed to ride my bf due to my weight gain. It‚Äôs nice to see you mention how you‚Äôve changed. Gives some hope. Thank you for sharing.

Please stop lying to her.
You don‚Äôt have to stop watching porn, but you have to stop lying to her.
You‚Äôre destroying her and she will never recover so long as you don‚Äôt recover.
She will make herself the enemy when it‚Äôs your addiction that really is the enemy.

You think you have it bad? Try walking in her shoes just for a day. You will keel over.

I am sorry this is happening to you. I feel for you, I‚Äôm in love with a PA  and I‚Äôve been so manipulated by him AND my own brain that the crossroads I thought I was at keeps moving away from me.

You must realize your codependency here. 
This is going to destroy you. You‚Äôre already ruined to a degree because of this becuas you don‚Äôt have the courage in yourself to get away. 
It‚Äôs in you - he took it. Get it back.
He‚Äôs not good for you because he‚Äôs making YOU not good for YOU. 

Sending love and light to you. Fight with all your might. You can meet people. You can do this.

I‚Äôm open to venting in direct message if you want. 
I‚Äôm just as miserable - sometimes it helps to share.

I know that you feel this was your fault. It‚Äôs important though to recognize that your girlfriend was all ready affected by depression prior to knowing you. Being that she was in the community and not under treatment, the risk was always there. It would have been there before you and after you, with you, or with someone else.
She was very sick, and you did the best you could, even you did your best in hindsight on your actions in your own sickness.
This is no one‚Äôs fault. 

You‚Äôre going to feel guilty for some time while you profess this, and more. Please make sure you are reaching out for professional help and let your loved ones know how you feel. 
It‚Äôs important to be known. Make these things known so you can receive the help and the love that you need to get through this. 

Peace to you, I‚Äôm so sorry.
Your post put me to tears. I‚Äôm going through the same situation. Thanks for sharing - I don‚Äôt feel so alone in this.

Remember that this is an addiction, and none of this is a reflection of you. You are caring for the one you love, and the one you love will relapse. You have to be able to ancitioate these fallbacks and relapses. Consider looking at his issue no differently than alcoholism or heroin addiction - addiction is addiction!
I am going through almost the EXACT SAME situation with my boyfriend of 3 years. Some days I question my sanity, and wonder why I am subjecting myself to this pain. 

I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôre going through this, too.
